00029 #ifndef __Serializer_H__
00030 #define __Serializer_H__
00031 
00032 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00033 #include "OgreString.h"
00034 #include "OgreDataStream.h"
00035 
00036 namespace Ogre {
00037 
00049     class _OgreExport Serializer : public SerializerAlloc
00050     {
00051     public:
00052         Serializer();
00053         virtual ~Serializer();
00054 
00056         enum Endian
00057         {
00059             ENDIAN_NATIVE,
00061             ENDIAN_BIG,
00063             ENDIAN_LITTLE
00064         };
00065 
00066 
00067     protected:
00068 
00069         uint32 mCurrentstreamLen;
00070         FILE* mpfFile;
00071         String mVersion;
00072         bool mFlipEndian; // default to native endian, derive from header
00073 
00074         // Internal methods
00075         virtual void writeFileHeader(void);
00076         virtual void writeChunkHeader(uint16 id, size_t size);
00077         
00078         void writeFloats(const float* const pfloat, size_t count);
00079         void writeFloats(const double* const pfloat, size_t count);
00080         void writeShorts(const uint16* const pShort, size_t count);
00081         void writeInts(const uint32* const pInt, size_t count); 
00082         void writeBools(const bool* const pLong, size_t count);
00083         void writeObject(const Vector3& vec);
00084         void writeObject(const Quaternion& q);
00085         
00086         void writeString(const String& string);
00087         void writeData(const void* const buf, size_t size, size_t count);
00088         
00089         virtual void readFileHeader(DataStreamPtr& stream);
00090         virtual unsigned short readChunk(DataStreamPtr& stream);
00091         
00092         void readBools(DataStreamPtr& stream, bool* pDest, size_t count);
00093         void readFloats(DataStreamPtr& stream, float* pDest, size_t count);
00094         void readFloats(DataStreamPtr& stream, double* pDest, size_t count);
00095         void readShorts(DataStreamPtr& stream, uint16* pDest, size_t count);
00096         void readInts(DataStreamPtr& stream, uint32* pDest, size_t count);
00097         void readObject(DataStreamPtr& stream, Vector3& pDest);
00098         void readObject(DataStreamPtr& stream, Quaternion& pDest);
00099 
00100         String readString(DataStreamPtr& stream);
00101         String readString(DataStreamPtr& stream, size_t numChars);
00102         
00103         virtual void flipToLittleEndian(void* pData, size_t size, size_t count = 1);
00104         virtual void flipFromLittleEndian(void* pData, size_t size, size_t count = 1);
00105         
00106         virtual void flipEndian(void * pData, size_t size, size_t count);
00107         virtual void flipEndian(void * pData, size_t size);
00108 
00110         virtual void determineEndianness(DataStreamPtr& stream);
00112         virtual void determineEndianness(Endian requestedEndian);
00113     };
00117 }
